contents:
想要發twitter介紹這兩個消息的，我有翻譯英文：The only communication application in China is called Wechat which is severely monitored and controlled by the government. For this moment, the state is constantly sending messages to all the discussion groups to threat and ban the dissemination of the coronavirus news in China.

At the beginning some messages claim that it is to prevent the spread of misinformation.

As the situation becomes more and more serious, the message says that no matter what the reason is, no matter the information is true or not, it is forbidden to discuss this epidemic under the penalty of suspension of account for eternity
